titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5427) making appropriations for energy and water development for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2007, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5427) making appropriations for energy and water development for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2007, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-479, by Mr. Hastings (WA).

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 5427 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be read by paragraph. Bill is open to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 183.

action.text: On motion to consider Agreed to by voice vote.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 832.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on H. Res. 832, Mr. Hastings (WA) moved the previous question and by voice vote, the Chair announced that the previous question was ordered. Mrs. Matsui subsequently demanded the yeas and nays and the Chair announced that further proceedings on ordering the previous question would be postponed until Wednesday, May 24, 2006.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 224 - 190 (Roll no. 194).

vote.text: Passed/agreed to in House: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 254 - 165 (Roll no. 195).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 254 - 165 (Roll no. 195).

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 5427 (Energy and Water Development Appropriations Act, 2007).
